attributes.action: either scrap the new NHS patient database or at least operate it on an opt-in only basis.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The new database whereby the government and all their agencies have access to all of our most intimate details in our medical records is unacceptable and unconstitutional. If this database is to go ahead then it should be operated on an opt-in basis only and not the compulsory basis which the government intend.  Compulsory inclusion on such a database is a violation of our right to privacy and our human rights.
